Zvezda misli na prelazni rok: Četiri imena na transfer listi
04 Nov 2019, 17:32 by Zile
Jesenji deo sezone u Linglong Superligi polako se bliži kraju, a klubovi se pripremaju za predstojeći zimski prelazni rok.
Crvena zvezda je na dobrom putu da osigura jesenju titulu, uz određenu dozu sreće može se dogoditi i evropsko proleće i u klubu svakako razmišljaju o promenama u igračkom kadru.
Kako je preneo „Telegraf“ za sada je poznato da će se četiri imena naći na transfer listi ove zime.
El Fardu Ben je već bio na izlaznim vratima letos, ali je u poslednjem trenutku došlo do preokreta i ostao je na stadionu „Rajko Mitić“. Ove jeseni je potvrdio da nije zaboravio da postiže golove, a kako mu ugovor ističe na kraju sezone sledeći prelazni rok će biti poslednja prilika da Zvezda zaradi od njegovog transfera.
Sledeća imena na transfer listi su Milan Pavkov i Ričmond Boaći, ali je teško pretpostaviti da će klub prodati obojicu i ostaje da se vidi ko će od njih dvojice i narednog proleća nositi crvno-beli dres.
Konačno, tu je i Milan Jevtović koji šansu dobija na kašičicu i koji je nedavno najavio da će ako se situacija ne promeni napustiti Zvezdu ove zime.

The star thinks of a deadline: Four names on the transfer list
04 Nov 2019, 16:32 by Zile
The autumn part of the season in the Linglong Superliga is slowly coming to an end, with clubs gearing up for the upcoming winter transition.
The Red Star is well on its way to securing a title in the fall, with a certain amount of luck a European spring can also happen, and the club is definitely considering a change in the player's staff.
According to Telegraph, it is now known that four names will be on the transfer list this winter.
El Fardu Ben was already at the exit door this year, but at the last moment there was a turnaround and he remained at the Rajko Mitic stadium. He confirmed this fall that he has not forgotten that he has scored goals, and as his contract expires at the end of the season, the next transfer deadline will be the last opportunity for Star to earn from his transfer.
The next names on the transfer list are Milan Pavkov and Richmond Boaci, but it is hard to assume that the club will sell both of them and it remains to be seen which of the two will wear the red and white jersey next spring.
Finally, there is Milan Jevtovic who is getting a chance at a teaspoon and who has recently announced that if the situation does not change he will leave the Star this winter.
